input_email_body:
Subject: Encountered Issue with Payment Processing

This error could be related to outdated software or a configuration problem My name is David Kim.. I have already restarted the system, reviewed the logs, and contacted the bank, but the problem continues. I would greatly appreciate your investigation and prompt resolution of this issue.
